from sortedcontainers import SortedList

class Solution:
    def minimumDistance(self, points: List[List[int]]) -> int:
        sums, diffs = SortedList([p[0] + p[1] for p in points]), SortedList([p[0] - p[1] for p in points])
        ans = max(sums[-1] - sums[0], diffs[-1] - diffs[0])
        for x, y in points:
            sums.remove(x + y)
            diffs.remove(x - y)
            ans = min(ans, max(sums[-1] - sums[0], diffs[-1] - diffs[0]))
            sums.add(x + y)
            diffs.add(x - y)
        return ans
